name: RoboPup
description:
Have you ever left your sheep lying around?

Do they feel like they are always out of control?

Well I have one good boy for you.

Presenting: RoboPup

He will

  •  Find your sheep
  • Bring them back home
  •  Be the goodest boy

* RoboPup has limited battery reserves. For more, contact our sales team about RoboDoggy.
